body: which version of Android have to tested on?

After a bit of research, I think you are using Android v 7.1 or less. [`File.toPath()`][1] is supported from API level 26 ([Android v 8.0][2]). The new zip4j update uses a lot of `File.toPath()` for some newly introduced features. I will analyse a work around for it and try to come up with a fix. But this will most likely mean losing those features in Android version <= 7.1, as without that api, it will not be possible to support those features, for example: support for Symlinks. 

[1]: https://developer.android.com/reference/java/io/File#toPath()
[2]: https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/manifest/uses-sdk-element#ApiLevels
@srikanth-lingala if it can help, here's basic android project to test `zip4j` (it's the one I used in the past) https://github.com/nicolabeghin/zip4jtest

I have made a fix for this issue, but I have made only a snapshot release for now. Can you please test with version `2.4.1-SNAPSHOT` and let me know if it works fine now? If you have any trouble to get this snapshot version from maven, please have a look at [this answer][1].

[1]: https://stackoverflow.com/a/7717234/2736153
@lovekill are you interested anymore? If not, I'll pick it up since we're using log4j on Android. @srikanth-lingala if you can reopen the issue?
@nicolabeghin Yes, I will reopen. It would be great if you can test and let me know if all works fine (especially including the new feature to rename a file in zip). Thanks.

I think the best long-term solution will be to run all the tests under Android. Could you kindly upload the 2.4.1 sources on another branch so that I can check it out and set up an Android project comprehensive of unit testing?

Updated repo https://github.com/nicolabeghin/zip4j-android-test with ready-to-use structure able to pull latest zip4j lib and run tests against Android runtime. Here's results against stable version `2.4.0`: 

> zip4j in zip4j: 530 total, 2 error, 528 passed

[Test Results - zip4j_in_zip4j.html.zip](https://github.com/srikanth-lingala/zip4j/files/4289893/Test.Results.-.zip4j_in_zip4j.html.zip)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2743637/75927482-bdae0a00-5e6c-11ea-9a0e-4a5de06e6f85.png)
@nicolabeghin Thanks for setting up tests for Android. Appreciate it. I will try to get it integrated into the build lane on travis.
@lovekill I will have a look at the issue.
